summary: Darth Vader (2017-2018) #23 - Fortress Vader Part V - Written by Charles Soule - Art Layouts by Giuseppe Camuncoli - Art...
caption:
Darth Vader (2017-2018) #23 - Fortress Vader Part V - Written by Charles Soule - Art Layouts by Giuseppe Camuncoli - Art Finishes by Daniele Orlandini - Colors by David Curiel and Dono Sánchez-Almara

Obviously there is A LOT going on here.

One thing I find interesting is how Vader refuses to rest up before trying to bring Padmé back from the dead. This is his tenth attempt at opening the gate in this issue, and gathering your strength before trying something like that does not sound unreasonable. There is this chest beating element to the whole endeavor, where it feels like Vader wants to be able to claim he tried to bring her back just as much if not more than he actually wants to bring her back (and therefore have to face actual consequences and deal with a full person who has made it clear to him that she does NOT approve of the path he chose - could never approve of it - and who would not have magically changed her mind - especially after all the atrocities he has committed since she died. To bring Padmé back is to be confronted once more with her disapproval and horror. I honestly don’t know what Vader is thinking will happen here, because I fully expect that if he does revive her successfully she is going to make no secret of how she feels, and Vader is going to murder her again).

Then again we know Darth Momin’s spirit was trying to get Vader to leave so he could bring himself back from the dead. So maybe Vader doesn’t actually need to rest up?

As interesting as that all is - the gate.

The Dark Side portal through the Force which may be used to bring back the dead, opens onto a star filled expanse with glowing energy and white lines. It reminds me of the World Between Worlds in a lot of ways, which we know Palpatine was trying to no avail to access.

Momin’s ability to bring himself back makes it clear that this portal works, but is it really bringing back the dead or pulling them through time? Momin’s mask means his spirit can possess anyone who puts it on, and Momin’s body is wearing it, so there is no way for us to gage through Momin how successful this method really is or how aware those who came through the gate truly would be. 

The only things Revived!Momin does before putting on his mask are greet himself and reach for his mask. Yet in that time we do see his speech bubble shift in structure between the newly revived maskless state and being possessed by his own spirit. So who knows what this gate is really doing.

Finally, the thing that really strikes me here is that there are only two issues of this comic left before it ends.

That is nowhere near enough time for this title to in any way explore Vader actually bringing Padmé back, and the implications thereof. Still, I am sure those final two issues are going to be a wild ride, what with Darth Momin back from the dead, along with the way the final issue of Tales from Vader’s Castle made it clear that that the battle with the Mustafarians we saw brewing in this issue is only starting.

tags: Rogue One A Star Wars Story
summary: 'Rogue One: A Star Wars Story' by Tom Whalen, a new print release through Bottleneck Gallery and Dark Ink Art, in collaboration...
caption:
‘Rogue One: A Star Wars Story’ by Tom Whalen, a new print release through Bottleneck Gallery and Dark Ink Art, in collaboration with Acme Archives, as revealed on io9.

36" x 24" screen print in a numbered Regular edition of 295 for $50, and a numbered UV embellished Variant edition of 150 for $55.

On sale Thursday November 15 at 12pm ET / 9am PT from Bottleneck Gallery and Dark Ink Art.

blog.name: johnnyclash87
blog.title: Fandoms Books Social Consciousness
blog.description:
I'll come up with a better title eventually.

Short and sweet I'm a nerd/geek. I listen to punk. I'm a feminist. I'm an lgbtq ally. I'm a wanna be superhero/adventurer. Because I talk a lot about race and racism I should probably clarify that I’m white and male.?

One of the things I love is how speculative fiction can be used to talk about serious topics. Which is what this will mostly be about. Along with just some fun things.

summary: Ya know what I just realized?
body:
Ya know what I just realized?

So one of the criticisms of the new Star Wars trilogy, specifically Rey and Finn is that Rey has skills that are never explained and Finn too easily broke his conditioning.

But looking back at A New Hope.. Luke is able to accurately shoot at Stormtroopers while being shot at himself and has no qualms about killing another sentient being. And don’t tell me he knew how to shoot from being on the farm, those are very different situations, and all those years of fighting off Sand People didn’t keep one of them from literally walking right up to him. Also speaking of different situations..his comment about shooting womp rats.. Do womp rats shoot back and if you didn’t hit them would a whole planet and the only hope for the entire galaxy be annihilated? Because that’s exactly what the Death Star attack was.

But back to him killing other people. Add the Death Star into that and that has to be another few thousand he’s killed. And maybe you could says the Stormtrooper armor makes them look inhuman so it wouldn’t have much psychological affect. But you’d think he’d still feel something. Plus I think we can assume there were other prisoners on the Death Star.

Anyway, point being we need to stop expecting perfect explanations for everything fictional characters do.

title: You Belong To Me
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2DE95Lm

by moonlightgisaeng, xXCuteMariaClaraXx

~*A Reylo Addams Family AU*~

Rey could feel all the men’s eyes on her. Trying to posses her. Ben Solo’s eyes burn with a murderous rage as he asserts his claim over what is rightfully his. No man will ever touch his wife… No one.

Words: 1276, Chapters: ½, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Kylo Ren, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey (Star Wars)
  • Relationships: Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren

title: Duty Above All
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2RZ51sf

by rosensilence

It’s Hux’s duty to his father and to Arkanis to abandon his promising military career in favor of a political marriage to someone he’s never met. He deserves more than a cruel stranger for a husband and a loveless marriage, but maybe more is exactly what he’ll get.

Words: 1525, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Tumblr ficlets

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Armitage Hux, Kylo Ren, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren
  • Relationships: Armitage Hux/Kylo Ren, Armitage Hux/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren
  • Additional Tags: Arranged Marriage, Alternate Universe - Arranged Marriage, Brendol Hux’s A+ Parenting, Arkanis traditions, Political Marriage, Hux deserves better than this, but I’m sure he gets a happy ending

title: You Belong To Me

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2DE95Lm

by moonlightgisaeng, xXCuteMariaClaraXx

~*A Reylo Addams Family AU*~

Rey could feel all the men’s eyes on her. Trying to posses her. Ben Solo’s eyes burn with a murderous rage as he asserts his claim over what is rightfully his. No man will ever touch his wife… No one.

title: Walk of Shame
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FjjL3G

by rosensilence

Armitage Hux comes home from work at 6am every Sunday morning. That his hot neighbor also comes home every Sunday at the same time reeking of sweat and sex seems entirely unfair.

blog.name: sillytastemakerstudent-me

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina
